topic.title: Benny Marzano's
topic.shortdesc: A Blacksburg staple. I think as students, we all know that you haven't properly experienced all that this town has to offer until you've had a slice of Benny's.

body.p:
Let's dive into a little history here. Building upon the original Benedito's persona, "Marzano's" represents the authenticity of Benny. This comes from the type of tomatoes famously used on pizza, the San Marzano tomato.
Benny Marzano's was our first location, the OG Benny's, aka The Mothership. They opened September 2, 2011 at the fulcrum of the 16 blocks of Downtown Blacksburg. They proudly state that they have "been beaten, broken, but stay true to our roots and keep on cookin'." I will always go back for their beloved, delicious, classic ginormous pizza slices which sets them apart from so many other pizzas spots. Never gets old!
